report.title: UKBMS Site Download Report
report.description: Lists saved sites and their attributes.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM detail_locations l JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND l.parent_id IS NULL #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: l.id AS site_id, l.name AS site_name, l.code AS site_code, ctt.term AS site_type, l.centroid_sref, l.centroid_sref_system

param.name: cms_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute used to hold the CMS User ID
param.where: EXISTS (SELECT id FROM location_attribute_values lav WHERE lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #cms_attribute_id# AND lav.int_value = #cms_user_id# AND lav.deleted=false)

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
